# Drone News 48h Brief — November 05, 2025

_Window: last 48 hours; 93 incidents._

## Summary
In the past 48 hours, drone incidents have predominantly affected airports in Belgium, resulting in multiple flight cancellations and disruptions. Notably, drones have caused extensive delays at Brussels and Liege airports, prompting heightened security concerns and emergency meetings by officials. Additionally, drone sightings near military airbases have raised alarms about potential threats to national security. Incidents related to drone smuggling continue, particularly concerning prisons, where authorities are innovating solutions to counter these breaches. The broader implications include discussions around policy changes and enforcement related to drone regulations aimed at enhancing security measures.

**By category:** airport: 36 • arrest: 8 • crash: 6 • other: 15 • security: 3 • smuggling: 19 • terrorism: 6
**Top queries:** drone incident (26), drone airport disruption (19), drone smuggling (11), drone terrorism (11), drone prison (9)

## Clusters
